segments.text: Would you please teach me how to use the computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , let's take a look at the menu first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to turn on the computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , we can look at the computer and computer menu at the same time.And this will help us understand both better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right now I ' ll teach you to open files , save files and copy files . Are you ready ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am ready I am going to get , let's start !
segments.speaker: S1
